Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Just to remind you I'm alive, I 
thought I'd make a poll.  Do you think 
time should be accelerated in the 
rpg?  Basically, I'm saying if we 
started incorporating reproduction, 
could we suddenly speed up time so the 
next generation was fighting, as 
opposed to doing another restart (I 
don't mean now, I mean in three or 
four years when something like that's 
neccessary again). 

  o Yes 
  o No 
  o OH NO!!!!!  YOU'RE ALIVE!!!! 
  o DANG YEAH!!!!  YOU'RE ALIVE!!!! 
  o Oh......you're alive.......really?....you sure?..... 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=1145954  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
